column1: Little Goat Diner////The coffee? Really good. The appetizers & side items? Really good. The main courses? Â Good
column3: but not great. I had the "famous" Bulls-eye French toast
column5: it was lacking in amount of chicken. Lots of bread and syrup
column6: but only a few pieces of chicken. The cheesy grits were hot and flavorful; the patty melt & breakfast spaghetti merely average. Not bad
